tool_description: Rev.ai provides the most accurate speech-to-text service on the market via a REST API. Get more out of your audio and video with our unmatched accuracy.
name: Rev.AI
title: Rev.AI

api_list.name: Submit Transcription Job
api_list.description: Submits a transcription job. Specify the audio / video to transcribe using a public URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rev-ai.p.rapidapi.com/jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rev-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rev-ai.p.rapidapi.com/jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rev-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
